channel.title: A challenge for all of you item coders and makers
channel.description:
I am holding a challenge to see who is the best item creator!!! This will show who is truely the best and while i hand out my challenges you can send in your own creations, NOT ITEMS THAT ARE JUST COLOUR CHANGED but ones pretty much from scratch unless it had a base item and is majorly editted!!!
THE FIRST CHALLENGE FOR YOU ALL IS.... DRACONIC ARMOR ... or ... ANGEL / DEVIL ARMOUR with wings, tails, horns ect...
DO NOT POST YOUR ACTUAL ITEM FILE JUST POST PICTURES!!!
GOOD LUCK TO YOU ALL!
